pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - DesignMosaic DesignMosaic Home About us Services Contact Order Privacy Policy DesignMosaic ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users ("you" or "your"). This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect from you when you use our website (the "Website"), how we use that information, and the choices you have about your information. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from you: Personal information you provide to us, such as your name, email address, and contact information when you contact us or sign up for a service. Information collected automatically when you visit the Website, such as your IP address, browser type, and browsing history on the Website. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To provide and improve the Website and its services. To respond to your inquiries and requests. To send you administrative information, such as changes to our terms and conditions. For marketing and promotional purposes, but only with your consent. Your Choices You have choices regarding your information: You can access and update your information by contacting us. You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on the Website. The DesignMosaic website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline DesignMosaic Your destination for exquisite furniture designs.
